definition: key (on a piano or computer keyboard)/button (on a mouse or other device)/chemical bond/linchpin

sentences.english: For example, if you have a three-button mouse, the middle button is unaffected.
sentences.chinese: 例如，如果您有三鍵鼠標，中鍵不受影響。

sentences.english: Calibration is easy with the built-in 3 button keypad.
sentences.chinese: 校準可以很方便地內置三鍵鍵盤。

sentences.english: A triple bond, again is going to have one sigma bond on the internuclear axis.
sentences.chinese: 一個三鍵，同樣的也有沿着核間軸sigma鍵。

sentences.english: The last bond I will talk about is the triple bond, which is the sharing of three pairs of electrons.
sentences.chinese: 還有一種是三鍵，由兩個原子共享三對價電子形成。
